home.eyebrow: Reputation intelligence for deals and promises
home.tagline: Track every promise, measure delivery, and keep your reputation sharp. Dreddi watches the details so your deals stay honest.

onTime.label: On-time completions
onTime.descriptionSignedIn: Each on-time delivery boosts your reputation.
onTime.descriptionGuest: Sign in to start tracking how on-time completions help your score.

recentDeals.title: Recent deals
recentDeals.guestHint: Sign in to see your live promises. Here’s what an active reputation feed looks like.
recentDeals.empty: Create your first promise to populate your reputation feed.

overview.title: Your promises overview
overview.subtitle: Snapshot of everything you promised and what was promised to you.

empty.title: Nothing here yet
empty.promisorDescription: You haven’t created any promises yet. Start a new one to track your commitments.
empty.counterpartyDescription: Nothing has been promised to you yet. Accept an invite link to get started.
